Resume

I am a leader and mentor who is skilled in building high performing software development teams. I cast a clear vision for the team, focusing on efficiency, teamwork, collaboration, and growing technical knowledge. I am also a developer who has built quality web applications for over 20 years.

Professional Experience
SOFTWARE DEVELOPMENT MANAGER
 BRIDGE2 SOLUTIONS,  Alpharetta, GA   2015 - 2017
Bridge2 Solutions provides marketing and fulfillment solutions to financial institutions, loyalty programs and Fortune 500 companies, creating a next generation shopping experience for rewards customers.

Managed 25-30 developers and testers across three scrum teams who develop software for Citibank.

  • Was given a team that previously had considerable difficulty in past releases (missed dates, underestimated work, and serious quality issues).
  • After 6 months, my team had successfully delivered 3 quality releases on time and on budget.
  • Drove the team to focus on quality, causing the average defect rate during stabilization phase to drop from 15-25 per day when I started to 3-5 per day today.
  • Managed the successful migration from Struts 1/JDK 7/Tomcat 6/Hibernate 3/Subversion to Spring MVC 4/JDK 8/Tomcat 8/Hibernate 5/Git.
  • Led the team to start migration toward an Angular JS single page application.
  • Implemented Scrum agile methodology (standup, retrospective, backlog grooming, spring planning, sprint demo, story points, etc.).

Environment:
JDK 8, Tomcat 8, Groovy, Spring MVC, Hibernate, JSON, Javascript, CSS3, HTML5, Log4j, SQL Server, Unix, Git, Gerrit, GitFlow, Jenkins, Maven
SENIOR SOFTWARE DEVELOPER (2012 - 2014)
SOFTWARE DEVELOPMENT MANAGER (2014-2015)
 AMPLIFY,  Alpharetta, GA   2012 - 2015
Amplify creates digital K-12 educational products to empower teachers, students and parents.

Software Development Manager, 2014 - 2015
Led a high profile scrum team of 10 people in the creation of a digital curriculum delivery system to be used in K-12 classrooms. Was responsible for delivering the actual student-facing lessons and activities.

  • Delivered all quarterly releases on time with excellent quality.
  • Increased our average team velocity (points per person day) from 0.71 to consistently over 1.00 in 6 months with the highest being 1.11.
  • Interviewed and hired developers who became key contributors to the team.
  • Motivated the team over several weeks of triaging a complex vendor integration that had stopped working due to bugs in AngularJS and iOS 8.

Senior Software Developer, 2012 - 2014
Built and delivered an epub editor to support various customizations needed for the classroom environment, including sentence/line/paragraph numbering, in-book quizzes, and “reveal” words.

  • Wrote a set of Java classes to parse HTML files and process them to accurately detect and mark the end of sentences in epub HTML files.
  • Designed a process for importing, editing, packaging, and publishing epubs to Amplify’s ereader application.
  • Updated a single threaded publishing pipeline to add a threadpool to concurrently process numerous books at once (also identified and resolved several bottlenecks).

Environment:
JDK1.6, Grails, Groovy, Java, ZKUI, Spock, Cucumber, AngularJS, Javascript, Dropwizard, JSON, SLF4J, LogBack, PostGres, Unix, Git, Gitorious, GitFlow, Jenkins, Maven
